name: Chongyun
desc: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

desc.text:
Throughout its long history, Liyue has never had a lack of rumors and myths regarding all manner of evil spirits and demons. And regardless of the truth of such rumors, someone has to do something about them.
Chongyun was born into a renowned family of exorcists, and has possessed a natural ability to drive away evil spirits from a young age due to his pure-yang spirit. His powers of exorcism are far beyond the norm: his mere presence is sufficient to scatter evil spirits.
However, this has proven to be an inconvenience for Chongyun himself, for though he has undertaken hundreds of successful exorcisms, he has never come face-to-face with a single ghost or demon.
Chongyun believes in his heart that a true exorcist should exorcize evil with charms and swordsmanship. This natural ability that he has... is just not orthodox.
Therefore, he has dedicated himself to the study of exorcism techniques and martial arts, as well as seeking the haunts of evil spirits to prove himself an able and professional exorcist even without his unique physical condition.
Yet, when will that condition stop being a stumbling block on his path to self-realization?

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 2</color>
When Chongyun first ventured out as an exorcist, there had been much talk of an evil spirit lurking inside Liyue Harbor.
The victim of these hauntings was a woman from a family with a high enough stature to even have a word or two with the Liyue Qixing.
From a time she knew not when, her sleep began to be harassed by sounds that kept her awake, but every time she tried to follow the sound, it would suddenly shift behind her, and begin ringing again in her ears.
This shock caused her unspeakable distress, and she even lost weight for loss of appetite.
Her wealth was enough to hire the best exorcists from all over, but no matter what they tried, they had to retreat empty-handed. And not only did the noises persist, they even grew in boldness.
It was then, just when she had given up all hope, that Chongyun walked through her door.
"I apologize for coming just now, it has been far too sunny lately... I heard that this place houses a very stubborn ghost. Please, leave it to me."
Then Chongyun brought a chair over, and sat upon it in the middle of the house for a time.
That night, the strange sounds were no more.
The wealthy woman finally had a good night's sleep, and she came running to Chongyun the next morning with an overabundance of gold and jewelry as a reward.
But Chongyun, as was his wont, only accepted his usual fee of a few hundred Mora without an ounce of emotion on his face.
Ever since that incident, Chongyun has found that his reputation precedes him for miles around. He has become beloved in Liyue for his "style and character," and indeed scholars have given him this appellation: "a heart of clear water, and a face of ice."

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3</color>
However, calling his mannerisms and style "frosty" couldn't be farther from the truth.
Due to the abundance of yang energy in his constitution, he is constantly troubled by increased body temperature and sudden urges or impulses.
He has tried everything to alleviate the issues both physically and psychologically.
His methods include not drinking hot water, not eating hot or spicy food, wearing light clothes, not getting into arguments, keeping himself from being angered, staying indoors on sweltering days, and always bringing a parasol when on the job.
In short, he attempted to stay away from everything that might aggravate his condition.
Despite all this, his yang energy did not subside a whit.
A little depressed, Chongyun began to wrestle with his own body. When he heard about an evil spirit in Dragonspine, he made for the peak wearing only a shirt.
Though it was hard enough to keep himself warm, he still felt this insufficient. Digging a hole in a frozen lake, he jumped in and soaked in the icy water while waiting for the evil spirit to show itself.
After staying in the lake for half a day, he finally caught a glimpse of his target.
However, after pursuing it down to the mountainside, he discovered it was only a snow rabbit that had been frightened off by his flying swords and floating charms.
The fever that he ran afterward lasted far longer than it would in a normal person.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
Chongyun's pure-yang spirit is not only a huge obstacle in his path as an exorcist, but a constant daily hassle.
He must be extra careful to stay away from "heaty" things, to which he is very sensitive, or risk his yang energy and emotions going out of control.
Chongyun's clan once held a celebration party at Wanmin Restaurant. And though he waited until all the dishes had gone cold, he did not expect the tender rice balls to be stuffed with Jueyun Chili.
After but a single bite... Chongyun had no recollection of what happened next.
However, according to the victim, chef Xiangling of Wanmin Restaurant, many unforgettable things happened.
Chongyun first jumped onto the reception desk and shouted, "Everything's on me tonight!" — never mind that he did not actually have any money on him.
He then began to chat with customers at other tables as if they were old pals, bragging to them of how incredible his clan's exorcist arts were, never forgetting to taste other people's dishes on the tables before he left.
Lastly, he claimed to have sensed an evil spirit in Wanmin Restaurant. This he did not find, but he did slap a charm on Xiangling's forehead and chase her around with his sword.
Afterwards, Chongyun scrimped and saved for an entire month to pay Wanmin Restaurant back for the mess and any damages he might have caused; he also gave Xiangling an evil-warding talisman that he carved by hand.
But Xiangling, for her part, didn't mind Chongyun's "transgressions" at all. Instead, she felt that the crazy Chongyun was the real Chongyun, without any personal walls up.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5</color>
Chongyun has had the privilege of meeting a true friend in his long journey as an exorcist: Xingqiu.
In contrast to the hard-working Chongyun, Xingqiu was naturally gifted, and had a more flexible way of looking at problems.
After learning about Chongyun's troubles, Xingqiu came up with a possible solution.
"If you can't reduce the effects of your yang energy, what if you sought out an evil spirit that is immune to it?"
This was a eureka moment for Chongyun. Since then, Chongyun has no longer sought to alleviate his condition. Instead, he now tries to get Xingqiu to come with him to find such a spirit.
"What? Sightings of the legendary Aoyin near the Sea of Clouds? Leave it to me!"
"The old house at Feiyun Slope has been taken over by an evil spirit? My bad. I'll attend to it right away."
"A master exorcist is staying over at Wangshu Inn? I could learn a lot from him... Hmm, better go with a gift."
Xingqiu usually just makes these "leads" up as he goes, and thanks to his "advice," Chongyun often comes back empty-handed, blaming his bad luck.
"I tried my best to look for it, and even spent quite a sum purchasing more intelligence on that evil spirit — but I wound up missing it by a hair anyway," Chongyun says, abashed.
If Xingqiu has time to spare when such an occasion arises, he will encourage Chongyun, treat him to some new cold dishes he has found and then set off to get Chongyun's swindled money back.
A warm and reliable companion, indeed! — So Chongyun thinks at such moments. Who could he possibly trust, if not his fine friend Xingqiu?

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
In truth, Chongyun wishes that he could fit in more, but he is often forced to reject the invitations of others on account of his need to control his abundance of yang energy.
Of these practices, he finds one particularly incomprehensible: hot springs.
Bathing and "relaxing" in steaming-hot water? Even the sound of that scares him a hundred times more than freezing in a lake on Dragonspine.
However, he has also heard everyone sing yearning praises of these hot springs, praising their comfort, and asserting that they become more so the hotter they are, and that one is filled with energy for a whole week afterward.
Chongyun still doesn't know if this is true or if people are just teasing him.
And he would have dared to try it out, if not for the ever-present problem of his pure-yang spirit.
Xingqiu once asked him this:
"If you were able to master your yang energy and rid the world of all evil spirits someday...what would you do after that?"
This seemingly off-the-cuff remark troubled Chongyun deeply.
Perhaps he had indeed missed out on a lot in life on account of his condition.
But he doesn't regret spending time. If one way of living doesn't work, he just needs to find himself another — and in any case, he already has his answer.
If that day comes, well, he'll go to the hot springs then.

story.title: Field Guide to Demons and Beasts

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
The tomes that Chongyun's family has passed down from generation to generation detail every evil spirit they have ever subdued.
From little critters to the monstrous demons found in tall tales of horror, their varieties are almost dazzling.
It was one such terrifying story that inspired Chongyun's vow to rid the world of evil spirits.
But as far as he is concerned, inheriting these books has... also proved inconvenient.
Other than textual descriptions, the books also contain illustrations of said evil spirits that carefully detail their unique characteristics — even if the artist may not have been the greatest talent.
But Chongyun has never seen an evil spirit in his life. Unwilling to break with this artistic tradition, he was at a loss.
Ultimately, he would attempt to use his imagination to draw some suitably strange images.
—Thus did the Field Guide to Demons and Beasts grow ever more exotic. Best not to think too deeply about that seven-winged, five-legged chicken-beast or that half-fish, half-hilichurl demon.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
"Those other exorcists at least have the courtesy to wave their swords or tack on some talismans. You just sat here for a while, and now you say you're done, and that I should pay you? Who are you trying to fool?"
Chongyun faced a great deal of suspicion when he first took up the role of an exorcist.
He immediately faced one big hurdle: it was a lot easier to prove that "evil spirits are present" than not.
Of course he would seem a charlatan even compared to "exorcists" who just went through the motions.
With all the ability in the world but no place to use it, looked on with suspicion, and needing to suppress any passionate impulses...
Those who eventually apologized to him were also few.
But even so, Chongyun would not go with the flow, and use some fancy act to cover for his real method of conducting exorcism.
Even with his unique composition posing countless obstacles for him, Chongyun has never once considered giving up.
One day, he will become the greatest exorcist in Liyue, control his abundance of yang energy, and rid the world of evil spirits.
Perhaps it was this resolve that earned him the gods' favor — that said, the Vision granted to Chongyun was one of "Cryo" rather than "Pyro."
As to which of his goals it was that the Vision responded to, that is also a mystery.

value.name: Cold Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
value.desc: Chongyun's specialty. Though these springy noodles would be irresistible in the sweltering summer, Chongyun insists on dining on them even in the chattering cold of winter. What a guy.

value.name: Chongyun
value.desc:
"Frozen Ardor" Chongyun

"Ugh, summer… Please pass us by in peace…"

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>June 3, 2020</color>
"Want to see a different side of Chongyun? Find a way to get him into a hot spring, and you'll see!" — Wise words Xingqiu, who enjoys playing pranks on his friend.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/13049</color>

<color=#ffd780>November 8, 2020</color>
He may be a traveling thaumaturge from Liyue, but he is still but a youth. What does Chongyun sound like?
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/78493</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 7, 2020</color>
By this, do you mean to invite me to join you this day?
We exorcists are sworn to an unceasing duty to drive evil spirits from the land.
Still, exceptions can be made for birth— Hey, wait a moment! Let me finish my morning exercises!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1302924576372846594</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 7, 2021</color>
"I'm having some difficulty in illustrating the Field Guide to Demons and Beasts. Traveler, if you have met such a creature, could you describe how it looks?"
"The knowledgeable Paimon thinks such a legendary creature should look like this... How about we try to draw it first?"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/850776</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 7, 2021</color>
Phew... Thanks for sparring with me today, your martial arts are very different from what we learn as exorcists. I've learnt a lot!
Oh, did you ... make this snowman just for me?
It's pure ice and snow, cool and soothing to the touch, thank you!
What a rare gift, I hope it doesn't melt away too soon...
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/850790</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 7, 2022</color>
"Thank you for celebrating my birthday with me! But honestly, I feel a bit... uneasy about the color of this cake..."
"Don't worry. The red part isn't Jueyun Chili. It's just jam."
"Xingqiu and I spent a long time collecting fruits to make this jam. Don't let it go to waste!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/8469641</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 7, 2022</color>
Happy Birthday, Chongyun!
It's been too hot lately, I had no choice but to go to the mountains to escape the heat and train. You must have taken a long time to find me. What's the matter?
Oh, you brought me a popsicle? T—Thank you! That's really nice of you.
It didn't melt on the way despite the heat...
Mmm, it's refreshing and tastes sweet too. How did you do it?
Thanks to 葉山えいし for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/8469641</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 7, 2023</color>
"Xingqiu, I thought Xiangling only asked you to collect ingredients. Why are you dragging me along?"
"Hehe, isn't it a rare opportunity to prepare one's birthday meal with their friend?"
"Oh... Um, you do have a point there."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/21470614</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 7, 2023</color>
Though I can't possibly allow the weather to interrupt my daily training, it really is too sunny today...
*sigh * I much prefer it when it's a bit cooler. Hmm, you mean to say that glaring sunlight isn't necessarily all bad?
Such as how it refracts through shards of ice, like a rainbow of different colors! Somehow I've never noticed that before, even after all this time.
I wonder if it could be captured? Oh, it's nothing, just... I thought it would make a lovely gift for you.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/21470627</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 7, 2024</color>
"But wait, he actually fell into a deep stone cavern!"
"Ohhh!"
"I trust you all wish to know how the story proceeds? Listen closely, for all will be revealed in the next chapter..."
"Ahh... another cliffhanger! Alright, calm down, calm down..."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/33001022</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 7, 2024</color>
Good morning! These few days have been unbearably hot, making training even tougher...
So I asked Chef Mao to add double the Qingxin to my popsicles, with just a hint of Sweet Flower for flavor.
Don't underestimate this recipe. It not only helps with my training but tastes great too!
Want to try one? I've got plenty. Here, take one to cool off.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/33001023</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 25, 2020</color>
Happy Dragon Boat Festival, Traveler! Which flavor rice dumpling would you like?
What... you want to try ALL of them?
Um... then just take this whole batch.
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1276002177039753219</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 12, 2021</color>
Couplets are made to rhyme just so — would you care to give them a go?
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/183805</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 1, 2021</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
Travelers, please give Xiangling some suggestions. In addition to slime, are there any more suitable ingredients to improve the recipe?
<color=#ffacff>Miyoushe:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.miyoushe.com/ys/article/10146340</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 31, 2022</color>
Thinking back, we've come a long, long way! We traveled really far, explored so many places, and met lots of new friends! Paimon will always be with you, and be your best companion~ Dearest Traveler, adventuring is hard work, let's feast together!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1487999076503363587</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 3, 2022</color>
One volume, two volumes, three volumes. I've finally bought all the new novels at Wanwen Bookhouse.
Let's go to that store next, there are still many things to buy~
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1489086240322461697</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 3, 2022</color>
"How about adding some Jueyun Chili..."
"No, no way. I can't eat this!"
"Great, there're no carrots in it and it's stuffed with shrimp!"
"Ah, with such a view like this, I can't help but want to write a poem..."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/5146744</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 27, 2023</color>
Just a while more! The last course is almost ready!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/15602159</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 10, 2023</color>
"A—Auntie! The elders had me bring you a gift, and they said they would love to see you if you have the time to visit..."
"I see... Of course. Thank you."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/16913868</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 8, 2023</color>
Click image to view full wallpaper
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/22183092</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 15, 2024</color>
Food's ready! Relax, Chongyun — this dish isn't spicy in the slightest. Try it and you'll see!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/25261279</color>

imgDesc.text:
Original Outfit - Pure Spirit
Chongyun's outfit. A traditional thaumaturge's trappings.

desc.text: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> to all opponents in its path.
Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by <color=#ffd780>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> have their CD time decreased by 15%.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Spirit Blade: Cloud-parting Star</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> .
This effect can only occur once every 2s.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

<color=#ffd780>Spirit Blade: Cloud-parting Star</color> deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.
This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.

videoCollection.title: Character Demo - "Shenhe: Crane in the Wild" | Genshin Impact

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: My name is Chongyun. My family has practiced the art of exorcism in Liyue for many generations. Fate has been generous in allowing my path to cross with that of your distinguished self. ...Oh, no — my services are free of charge!

voice.title: Chat: The Art of Exorcism
voice.desc: Exorcism uses thaumaturgy and martial arts to conquer evil. There are other means to the same end, but they are not the true way.

voice.title: Chat: Diet
voice.desc: I take my meals cold to quiet the spirit and calm my vital energies. Qingxin-infused water with ice is the most effective.

voice.title: Chat: Mantras
voice.desc: "Heart be pure, evil be erased. Mind be purged, world be..." Um... Ugh, I always forget that last part.

voice.title: When It Rains
voice.desc: There is no purer form of water than rain. It can aid us greatly in the purging of evil.

voice.title: When Thunder Strikes
voice.desc: Before the resounding thunder, evil must cower in fear.

voice.title: When It Snows
voice.desc: Ah, this weather is delightful.

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: It is unwise to waste the precious morning hours. Time to train!

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: One's spiritual energies are at their peak at noon. We must take that time to practice.

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: As the day winds down and the quiet of evening sets in, the atmosphere is ripe for focusing your mind. There is no better time than this for training.

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: Whew. What a tiring day. You should get some rest. Don't forget what we agreed — we will investigate that haunted house tomorrow.

voice.title: About Chongyun: Exorcists
voice.desc: We exorcists have been protectors of Liyue since ancient times, and our techniques have been passed down from generation to generation. Purging evil is second nature to us.

voice.title: About Chongyun: Commissions
voice.desc: *sigh* I didn't actually do anything. I just walked into that haunted house, and the problem was resolved... Do you think I should still take payment for this exorcism?

voice.title: About Us: Companions
voice.desc: Your skills are impressive. When you finish with a hilichurl— I mean, an evil spirit, it is surely banished from this world for good. How about we team up?

voice.title: About Us: Ghost Stories
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

By now, you must be well acquainted with Liyue's supernatural phenomena. Now, about the evil beings you speak of in lands beyond... I would very much like to see them too.

voice.title: About the Vision
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Visions are powerful, but one would be foolish to place blind faith in them. Personally, I trust more in thaumaturgy and martial arts. In the end, one cannot become truly proficient without vigorous training.

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc: There are rumors abound concerning evil spirits in Liyue, but not all have truth to them. In fact, some strange commissions wind up having nothing to do with them at all.

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc:
Complete "A New Star Approaches"

I have heard there are many strange and rare things sealed within the amber from Mt. Hulao. Could some of them be the fabled demons of which the ancient legends speak? I would love to investigate.

voice.title: About Zhongli
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "Farwell, Archaic Lord"

That Zhongli from the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor seems to be quite an incredible man. Just think, common folk might gang up to commit a murder, we exorcists vanquish demons — but he alone buries the bodies of the adepti.

voice.title: About Xingqiu
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I do admire Xingqiu for his devotion to chivalry and his martial arts proficiency. However — I must warn you that he definitely has a mean side, too. If you find that you fall foul of any of his antics, come to me and we'll form a "Victims of Xingqiu" alliance. There is strength in numbers.

voice.title: About Xiao
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

The Conqueror of Demons himself has defended Liyue side-by-side with we exorcists for generations, day after day, night after night. I have the utmost respect for Adeptus Xiao. It's just... Why must he be so disparaging toward us? He says our repertoire is lacking and our power is trivial. I'm sorry, but I just can't accept that.

voice.title: About Hu Tao
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

The Wangsheng Funeral Parlor is a reputable institution that acts with integrity. But whenever I see that cheeky smile that says, "It's nothing you exorcists need to worry about," it just makes my blood boil... Whoa, deep breaths, Chongyun. Stay calm.

voice.title: About Qiqi
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

She looks like a zombie, but as an exorcist, I feel there's... something different about her. Hmm, her name is also absent from all the praised names I've seen... Where exactly does she fit in among the deities?

voice.title: About Xinyan
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I avoid Xinyan's performances like the plague. That heated atmosphere... Even if you don't intend to get involved, it still... Let's just say that it gets me all hot and bothered.

voice.title: About Xiangling
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Xiangling's cooking is universally praised, but I personally don't touch any of her spicy dishes. Why? Oh, you know — just, uh... personal preference, that's all. I mean, come on, Mushroom Slime Stew... Does that sound appetizing to you?

voice.title: About Shenhe
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "The Crane Returns on the Wind"

The elders in my clan have mentioned her before. The fate of her family... *sigh* It's something we can all sympathize with. I originally thought we would be able to bring a long-lost relative back into our clan. The elders were overjoyed, too, when they heard she was still alive — they even prepared gifts for her, and picked an auspicious day for a grand reunion. What we hadn't counted on was that most of the time, she's extremely difficult to track down. Wait a minute, based on our relative positions in the family tree, does that mean that I... There's no way I'd have to call her "Auntie Shenhe"... right?

voice.title: About Yelan
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I met her once, back when I'd just become an exorcist. I'd taken a commission to perform an exorcism in someone's home, and was just leaving at the end when I ran into her. She wrote my name down in a booklet — I guess she just wanted to confirm I wasn't doing anything suspicious... Anyway, it was just that one time, I never saw her again after that.
Now that I think about it, it's probably because the sight of me meditating motionless must be pretty boring to watch. Not exactly suspicious.

voice.title: More About Chongyun: I
voice.desc: Discipline is everything. Unbridled passion can have disastrous consequences. Trust me, I would know. ...Oh, no no no, not from personal experience, of course. Haha... Uh... I'm just stating my observations from what I've seen in my travels around Liyue.

voice.title: More About Chongyun: II
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3

I was born with something called congenital positivity, meaning I have too much positive energy... Apparently it's so rare it only happens once every thousand generations or so. It means I repel all evil for miles around... *sigh* Actually, that's a bad thing. I must be the only exorcist in history who can't get within ten miles of an evil spirit.

voice.title: More About Chongyun: III
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

One of the main symptoms of congenital positivity is excess passion, something which has gotten me into many embarrassing situations. In an effort to alleviate these symptoms, I have to abstain from eating chilis and all hot food. I also have to take a parasol with me everywhere, and I avoid listening to rousing music. I wonder, will I ever overcome my condition for good?

voice.title: More About Chongyun: IV
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

Waiting for evil to show up at the doorstep will get you nowhere — you have to go out and hunt it down. By purging Liyue of evil spirits, I bring peace of mind to people and also broaden my horizons. If an evil spirit ever bothers you, just let me know. I'll come and help you out right away.

voice.title: More About Chongyun: V
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

To permanently banish the forces of evil from the world is my ultimate goal as an exorcist. If that grand day ever comes, I suppose I should be able to consider trying many new things, such as hot springs, Jueyun Chilis, and... partaking in other activities of a more passionate nature. Ugh, what am I doing... Ugh, I shouldn't be dwelling on these things, even thinking about them is too stimulating for me...

voice.title: Chongyun's Hobbies
voice.desc: I like listening to Tea Master Liu's stories. His narration really brings the hair-raising tales of the supernatural to life. Why not come with me some time?

voice.title: Chongyun's Troubles
voice.desc: After making numerous inquiries and putting in an enormous amount of effort, I finally tracked down the location of an old haunted temple. So I camped out there for four whole days, ready to exorcise the hell out of that place... and nothing happened. Not even the faintest glimpse of an evil spirit. *sigh* Sadly, this is a regular occurrence for me.

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: Nothing makes me happier than sitting down to an authentic Inazuman meal, ingredients imported of course. After training hard all day, the ice-cold freshness of Inazuman cuisine takes the exhaustion away.

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: Anything piping hot and laden with chilies is an absolute no-go for me. The mere thought of a Jueyun Chili gives me hot flashes.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: Cold dishes are just to my liking! I'll save some for after my training.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: I'm sorry, I know you mean well, but I really need to wait for it to cool off before I eat it.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: Oh no! Did you put Jueyun Chilies in this?

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: On the anniversary of your birth, please accept this gift of a flower, made of ice crystals. I carved it myself. If you ever encounter an evil spirit, cast this toward it — the spell I have cast upon it will immediately come into effect and hopefully get you out alive. Also... Happy birthday.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 1

We often use these materials for thaumaturgy during exorcisms — I never knew they could be used to purify one's own spirit, too.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 2

Martial arts and thaumaturgy are alike in that there are always new dimensions to explore. Thanks to your guidance, I can see myself making progress.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 4

Never before have I fathomed such lofty heights of martial prowess! For eye and hand, man and blade to act in unity... Truly, I have been enlightened.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 6

With all the secrets arts that I have learned, my goal of banishing all evil from the world is finally in view. I will never forget how much you have done for me. Maybe now I even have what it takes to face the flames of my positive energy, and see if I can take the heat.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: A touch of frost!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Forth, my blade!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: Swift and merciful!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: IV
voice.desc: One with my blade!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: From whence you came!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: Spirit blade, attack!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: Submit for judgment!

voice.title: Deploying Wind Glider: I
voice.desc: I ride on wind and cloud alike.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: Hmm, objects like this may prove useful when purging evil spirits.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: It was worth the trouble!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: Unexpected, but welcome.

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: Barely a scratch.

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: I cannot underestimate my enemy.

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: Curb your fury!

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: I'm in position.

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: Hang on!

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: After all that training...

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: The scourge of evil remains...

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: This spells the end of the exorcists...

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: But how!?

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: Present.

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: My demon-expelling mantra is ready.

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: Time for some training?

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Teachings of Diligence
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Diligence is having the bravery and the strength to conquer mountains and seas and to pursue gold and prosperity through honest, hard work.

materials.name: Damaged Mask
materials.desc:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Diligence
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is the catalyst that flows in the blood of the people of Liyue, able to turn rocks into gold. It is what lies behind the greatness of its great commercial port.

materials.name: Stained Mask
materials.desc:
A bone mask, covered in unidentifiable stains, that emanates a mysterious odor.
Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Diligence

materials.name: Stained Mask
materials.desc:

Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Philosophies of Diligence
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is believing in one's own ability to earn a place in the land of the gods through sweat, wisdom, and power.

materials.name: Ominous Mask
materials.desc:
A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.

materials.name: Dvalin's Sigh
materials.desc:
A bit of power taken from the whirlwinds evoked by the Dragon of the East.
Beautiful and transparent, both trade winds and tornadoes will work in his name. The winds move as his companion, his voice, and his freedom.
His enemies are the thousands who stand against the wind.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

Beautiful and transparent, both trade winds and tornadoes will work in his name. The winds move as his companion, his voice, and his freedom.

materials.name: Crown of Insight
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> .
After a short delay, the cold air created by the Cryo explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field, within which all Sword, Claymore and Polearm-wielding characters' weapons will be infused with <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> .
"A crystal-clear ring, and all is silent. The rivers move not, and the clouds are heavy with frost. The altar gates open, and evil is banished."

Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground.
When the spirit blades explode, they will deal <color=#99ffff>AoE Cryo DMG</color> and launch opponents.
"As ice doth give the biting frost birth, My transcendent blade shakes heaven and earth. Heed my summons and come hence!"
Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters within the field created by <color=#ffd780>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 8%.

When the field created by <color=#ffd780>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> disappears, another spirit blade will be summoned to strike nearby opponents, dealing 100% of Chonghua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as <color=#99ffff>AoE Cryo DMG</color> . Opponents hit by this blade will have their <color=#99ffff>Cryo RES</color> decreased by 10% for 8s.
When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

textualResearch.title: [Guest Message] Chongyun, Wangshu Inn Bulletin Board

desc.text:
Guest Message
"My lack of caution in eating heaty foods led to my quite public buffoonery. I write this note to apologize to everyone, and I am willing to pay for all damages caused. —Chongyun"
Reply
Don't be so formal, young lad! Your swordsman friend already paid for the damages. In fact, everyone was impressed by the skill displayed when you leaped onto the table and danced with greatsword in hand. We all eagerly await your next performance.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Shivada Jade Sliver
materials.desc: Character Ascension Material.

materials.name: Cor Lapis
materials.desc: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

materials.name: Damaged Mask
materials.desc:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Shivada Jade Fragment
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."

materials.name: Hoarfrost Core
materials.desc:
The exposed core of a defeated Cryo Regisvine. Pure Cryo energy is contained within it.
Energy and thoughts that swell deep within the earth will eventually erupt on the surface. Even the deathly silent frost will attach to living things on the ground, turning even ordinary vegetation like vines into huge, vicious predators.

materials.name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."
